body: From the bottom of my heart, thank you, my friend. Sometimes, I feel like giving up, and that is why I don't review any on Sundays, but remembering that someone out there is making this journey with me, greatly helps me keep going. You are now also part of my journey and I'll review them knowing that someone out there is waiting for it. Thank you.

@MinaYaku

I have been captivated by thyne journey, carry on the fight. I await your next rating.

Day 45 - 1100*
All are of the dust, and all turn to dust again. It started with shit and it ended with shit.
1/10.
